name: Hierofanía
summary:
A stranger arrives at Utrecht's Dusk, a remote and almost deserted outpost of the once powerful and wise Knights of Utrecht. He says he has been accused of a crime he did not commit, and requests their help. But the Knights are not what they once were. Utrecht, god of Justice and their patron deity, has been missing for ten years, and can no longer lend them magic or guidance. Crocket, an unexperienced young squire, steps forward...

Hierofanía is a short fantasy visual novel with seven possible endings.
